Instance.description: An immediate interaction that creates affordance object pairs for all listed death interactions.

TunableList.name: death_options
TunableList.description: A list of deaths that this interaction can give.

TunableTuple.description: Tuple of the death interaction with a corresponding name.

TunableVariant.name: display_name_override
TunableVariant.description: If specified, will override the display name of the interaction using the class display name format.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The name that will appear in the pie menu for the death interaction.
